name: Cave Sovereign
description: The Cave Sovereign is a huge aberration with glowing antennae and a terrifying presence. Its skin is a mass of writhing tendrils, and it utilizes its size and chaotic aura to dominate its environment.
memorable: Its ability to stun opponents with mesmerizing Deathlights and control undead minions makes it a chilling foe.
goals: To dominate its territory and instill fear in those who venture close.
relations: It may be encountered alongside other aberrations or undead creatures it controls.
environment: Typically found in dark, subterranean caves or areas shrouded in chaos.
strengths: Resistant to various damage types and has the unique ability to incapacitate foes with its Deathlights.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity score leads to poor agility and reflects its ineffective dodging ability.
attacks: Multiattack allows for powerful combinations, including a biting attack that deals piercing and poison damage and a tail attack that can grapple foes.
most_powerful_ability: Consume Soul ability lets it target incapacitated or stunned creatures for devastating psychic damage, potentially raising slain humanoids as zombies.
senses: It has darkvision and tremorsense, allowing it to detect creatures without needing to see them directly.
skills: Limited awareness with a low perception skill, making it susceptible to being outmaneuvered.
additional_information: Deathlights can stun opponents, creating strategic combat opportunities.
Inscrutable nature protects it from being read or predicted by opponents.
Magic Resistance provides advantage against spells.
Sinuous Form allows it to navigate tight spaces.
spellcasting: Can cast various psionic spells without components, enhancing its tactical options.
test_queries: huge aberration that can stun enemies
creature with telepathic communication and undead control
monster with mesmerizing antennae and strong attacks
cave dweller that manipulates darkness and fear
chaotic sovereign with ability to consume souls
